title: New User Onboarding Assistance
description: A new user is having trouble with the initial setup of their account and data import.

tasks.description: Identify the user and review their account's onboarding checklist status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the user is stuck on the 'Import Data' step.

tasks.description: Review the user's import file and identify a formatting error in the date column.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the import problem.

tasks.description: Explain the formatting error and provide a link to the knowledge base article with correct import templates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the user fix their file and successfully complete the import.
